Universal Dark Mode

Transform your browsing experience with Universal Dark Mode, the extension that brings customizable dark themes to any website.


Features:

Toggle Dark Mode on Any Website:
- Instantly switch any website to dark mode with a single click or keyboard shortcut.

Multiple Dark Themes:
- Choose from a selection of beautifully crafted dark themes to suit your preferences.

Easy-to-Use Interface:
- A clean and intuitive popup menu allows you to enable dark mode and select themes effortlessly.

Keyboard Shortcut:
- Use Ctrl + Shift + U to quickly toggle dark mode on or off without opening the extension menu.

Persistent Settings:
- Your selected theme and dark mode preference are saved and automatically applied on your next visit.

Support Development:
- If you enjoy the extension, consider making a donation to support ongoing improvements.


Why Use Universal Dark Mode?

Reduce Eye Strain:
- Dark mode can help minimize eye fatigue during nighttime browsing or in low-light environments.

Customizable Appearance:
- Personalize your web experience with themes that match your style.

Energy Efficiency:
- Dark mode can save battery life on devices with OLED or AMOLED screens.


How to Use:

Enable Dark Mode:
- Click the extension icon and toggle the "Enable Dark Mode" switch, or press Ctrl + Shift + U to toggle dark mode instantly.

Select a Theme:
- In the extension popup, choose your preferred theme from the list.

Enjoy a Better Browsing Experience:
- The selected dark theme will be applied to the current website and others as you browse.


Permissions:

Access to All Websites:
- Required to apply dark mode styles to the websites you visit.

Storage:
- Used to save your preferences for dark mode and selected themes.
